title: Bistrô 12
description:
Bistrô 12 is a website that allows users to buy meals made by local chefs and then have them delivered to their homes.

The system runs on 3 major areas: Available Chefs, Registered Users and General Administration.

In the Chefs section they can edit their profile; add/edit/delete meals; see all received orders; check the monthly revenues as well as reviews received from users.

In the Registered User's section it's possible to order a new meal, check all orders made and rate dishes.

The General Administration section allows approving chefs/meals; checking registered users, orders – including pending and cancelled ones – and changing the percentage charged for each chef.

Front-end developed with AngularJS 1.5, back-end developed with Laravel 5.1 and MySQL as database. Blog developed using Wordpress.
